title: Humans of TPOT: Brian Brain
content:
Yesterday, I was pondering how we arrived at this point in life. Countless events became entangled, giving birth to new occurrences. I also realized that it’s all just a complex web of interactions involving multiple events triggered by different individuals. So, we find ourselves here due to the actions of various people, including my own, and everything has simply accumulated.
Anyway, today we bring to you, Dr. @Brian ji! (he is real doctor not phd one :P)
I met Brian Ji in a mutual Twitter group chat, and as always, I started asking silly questions. Not only was he nice enough to answer them all, but he also DMed me, saying that I can ask him questions whenever I want. Even my teachers haven’t entertained the idea of their students asking silly questions.
He lives in Las Vegas. Also, he doesn’t consume any seed oils. I was blown away when I learned about it.
I normally meet a lot of cool anonymous users on Twitter, but the first genuinely cool person with a profile picture of himself. He used to collect basketball cards when he was a kid. Did I mention that he is a doctor? The Indian shaadi market will go nuts for him.
Questionnaire
When did you join?
My profile says I joined March 2015, but I probably didn‚Äôt start really using Twitter until summer/fall 2016.
Origin of your username/handle? (iff)
Seems pretty self-evident
How did you come across tpot?
Not sure to be honest, don‚Äôt think I intentionally became a part of it. Was just interacting with various accounts and becoming mutuals with them and then at some point we became tpot.
Which account do you worship here/ fav account?
That honor goes to my brother from another mother @varunramg. Also @pajeetbateman though sadly he is no longer with us.
Hobbies?
Hiking, reading, weightlifting, cooking, linguistics. Recently started taking dance classes which has been fun. *Based*
Profession?
Physician, specifically neurologist. Though I do telemedicine now that doesn‚Äôt involve seeing patients (if you listen to the podcast episode I have pinned on my profile I go into more details regarding exactly what I do).
What is your favourite breakfast?
My standard breakfast is usually just eggs and coffee. In terms of favorites however I do love Scandinavian and Japanese breakfasts (there‚Äôs something about having fish in the morning that hits the spot).
A dish you can never get enough of?
Sushi and yakiniku
Are you blocked by lex?
Last I checked, no. Somebody actually put me on a list called ‚ÄúNot yet blocked by Lex‚Äù.
Who is your favourite anime waifu/ fav actress/actor?
**Robert Downey Jr.** What is the secret to your bangers? **I just post and let the universe do with it what it will.** Favourite movie? (Any top 5) * **The Matrix** * **Lost in Translation** * **As Good As It Gets** * **John Wick 4** * **Parallels** any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? * **1er Gaou by Magic System** * **Wakarimasen by MIYACHI** * **Habibi by Ricky Rich & ARAM Mafia** * **Aitvaar by Jaz Dhami** * **SLR by Lupe Fiasco** any kinda sports you follow? **Not much of a sports guy** The last meme that made you chuckle? **Can‚Äôt recall exactly, but likely was something posted by @SeedOilDsrspctr** An image from your camera roll that you think captures your essence? We are eternally grateful to Brian ji for giving us the time and answering all the questions. We wish him all the best for all his future endeavours. Hope he gets to tour India and gets married, soon.
Brian ji will accompany you in Las Vegas if you subscribe

title: Humans of TPOT: Deba and West Bengal Politics
content:
You might have read the tweets where I mentioned that things have been slow here, slower than usual. But rest assured, I am working on it and will make sure the Hotpot blog doesn‚Äôt run into stagnancy.
Anyway, let‚Äôs get to today‚Äôs guest, the most handsomest person alive, @DebadreeC Do you notice the killer expression, no doubt his DMs are flooded with e-girls!
I first interacted with Deba on bbit, he is a friendly bengali bloke, there were times when he was active on twitter/X but I think now he has got more responsibilities at workplace so he is little less active now or maybe I don‚Äôt see him on my tl.
He is the Group HR at BBIT, being in WB he has political connections that help him gain a stronghold in the district he lives in. Just kidding. He is a Modiji fan, like me.
My thoughts are *mentioned_here*.
Basic Questionnaire
When did you join? I joined in my class 12th as far as i remember around 2018 wasnt part of tpot until i guess 2021
How did you come across tpot? First tpot account I had seen was probably unironictechbro he used to post absolute bangers followed by beeryaniboi and TDM
Which account do you worship here/ fav account? Shri hacker and Sankalp senpai account most wholesome¬†Hobbies? I am hobbieless mostly but i guess you could call watching netflix a hobby
Profession? SDE at a early stage startup
What is your favourite breakfast? Chocos *I thought of putting image of a chocos packet here but I don‚Äôt want to promote any product without getting sponsored by them*
A dish you can never get enough of? Biriyani
Are you blocked by lex? No (i am expelled from tpot now)
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders) javascript (stupid language)
Who is your favourite anime waifu? I dont watch japanese cartoon *JAPANESE CARTOON AODFJOENMFOLJMALp* *I asked him his favourite actress he said Laura Birn*
Laura Birn What is the secret to your bangers? Random unhinged thoughts
Favourite movie? (Any top 5) (i dont watch that many movies) Arrival, I am thinking of ending things (this was a weird but exotic one), Kantara, Tumbaad
any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? Pasoori pasoori pasoori pasoori pasoori *anti-nashunal vibes*
any kinda sports you follow? lol *I he meant no*
Favourite pepe?
We thank Debadree for taking out the time and entertaining our questions. May all his OSS PRs get merged without any comments. We wish him all the best for his future endeavours.
If you subscribe you will get free protection from Deba

title: Humans of TPOT: Go Go Go Govind ji
content:
I have been thinking about this a long time, what if we could do whatever we wanted without worrying about money. What would you do? I would read more, write sci-fi novels and interview people.
Anyway, let‚Äôs get to our guest for today, @DeepknowledgeU , or more famously known as Govind.
He is everywhere, but he is nowhere. He likes semi-conductors and protein. I haven‚Äôt interacted much on a personal level with him, only had conversations around infra in India, politics, defence manufacturing. I have seen him involved in muscle maxxing conversations, but I have no interest in gyming so I have nothing to contribute to those discussions.
My thoughts are enclosed in *my_inner_monologue*.
Questionnaire:
When did you join?
End of high school, wasn‚Äôt active until 2016-17, then deleted my account, then created it anew, like a Phoenix out of the ashes.
How did you come across tpot?
I got an honorary invite into the GC by one of the chaddest members of the group (has a jaw that looks like solid granite that can withstand a 1000 invasions)
Which account do you worship here/ fav account?
Closest I come to worshiping is probably John Carmack, but no I don‚Äôt worship, just follow: ID_AA_Carmack
Some serious tech poasting account I love : eatonphil, cto_junior (the ever amazing TDM) , and Token Bender (4evaBehindSOTA)¬†Hobbies?
Bouldering / bicycling / fixing my bike / reading (planning to pick up some physical tinkering hobby next year)
Profession? Software Engineer
What is your favourite breakfast? Black Coffee and Cigarettes (quit smoking, so just black coffee now )¬†Are you blocked by lex? Never followed him in the first place and no, not blocked
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders)
Ruby. There are language, shit languages, horrible languages and then there is Ruby, more specifically Ruby on Rails (or should I say Walking on Nails)
Who is your favourite anime waifu?
What is the secret to your bangers? Rhyming, Vibing and Timing
Incel? Thankfully no longer. Got myself Incel Therapy (wink wink :P)
Favourite movie? (Any top 5) : Predator, The Terminator , True Lies, Top Gun, Dark Knight
any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen?
**Tool - Parabol / Parabola** **Daft Punk - Derezzed** **Kyuss - (the entire Blues for the Red Sun album, its‚Äô just glorious)** **Metallica - Fade to Black**¬†**Buckethead - Siege Engine** any kinda sports you follow? **Football** _\*never saw him talk about football though maybe IRL he enjoys watching football\*_ Favourite pepe? The last meme that made you chuckle? https://img-9gag-fun.9cache.com/photo/amAOby4_700bwp.webp An image from your camera roll that captures your essence? how did you decide the username/handle? **my inspiration is the roots of a tree, you can have shallow / broad roots , that are flimsy** **(like coconuts)**¬†**or deep roots (like Teak) that can withstand centuries and keep growing** **Trees symbolise slow long term growth, observing the world slowly as it changes around them.¬†and it is in their calming presence that men often obtain divine knowledge. hence my pfp and handle** We are grateful to Govind ji for taking the time out and entertaining our questions. We wish him all the best for all his future endeavours. May he get a 6 figure $ salary so that he can adopt our Chief Editor. (We urge the GoI to let Govind ji misfire Brahmos missile into enemy territory *wink*)
Govind ji will give you investment advice for free if you subscribe

title: Humans of TPOT: Jeff ji Amrica
content:
I got up early today, because a mouse was making a ruckus and throwing things which were kept above the wardrobe. So I and my mother got up at 4:00 AM, and started chasing the mouse with broom and mop. After some time of brainstorming and blocking the mouse‚Äôs tracks, we were successful in my forcing the mouse to the go back the way he came from, that it, to the balcony.
Anyway, let me introduce today‚Äôs guest, @jbasedos !
I met jeff ji on bbit, one day he appeared, we did not know who he was. But his ideas and ideologies were a fit for bbit. Recently, we have had a small conversation on twitter on how Maggi Atta Noodles are goated. He has a PS5, he has a car, he works in tech, and I think one day he will come back to India, start his own company and employ me as the VP.
Our views on MCU also are synonymous, it has gone downhill. After End Game, it was the End of MCU. His favourite MCU character is Spider-man and I think MCU‚Äôs salvation is Spider-man. Everything else is gone. Turned to dust.
Questionnaire
When did you join?
Around 2018, I had a personal account before that but I purged it and went anon.
Origin of your username/handle? (iff)
Around the time Based was becoming popular in usage and Bezos was the richest man so I made a fun name Jeff BasedOS
How did you come across tpot?
I think the FIITJEE/Kalu Sarai mention in my bio caught the eye of a few anons ;)
Which account do you worship here/ fav account?
I particularly enjoy @humansoftpot :) *thank you kind sir*
Hobbies?
I love playing video games, I used to be super into lifting but has been downhill since I have no gym buddies now. *sed*
Profession?
Tech wagie
What is your favourite breakfast?
Over medium eggs or Poha if I‚Äôm back home
A dish you can never get enough of?
Seekh Kebab
Are you blocked by lex?
No, not on this account :P
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders)
**Java, no further comment** Who is your favourite anime waifu/ fav actress/actor? **Favorite actor is Christian Bale, I don‚Äôt watch anime anymore so haven‚Äôt kept up with the waifu scene.** \*After asking him to give a female name, he turned towards JL\* What is the secret to your bangers? **I don‚Äôt think I have any bangers lmao** Favourite movie? (Any top 5) **I‚Äôll do something different and mention my favorite movies that aren‚Äôt in the top 50 imdb since those are too cliche:** * **Wall E** * **Taare Zameen Par** * **Tonari no Totoro** * **Dune** * **Fury** any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? * **Desi Kalakaar - Yo Yo Honey Singh** * **Stay High - Juice WRLD** * **3005 - Childish Gambino** * **Fast Lane - Eminem** * **Yacht (K) - Jay Park** any kinda sports you follow? **I like motorsports, I follow both Formula-1 and MotoGP, I try to keep up with GT-Racing but its not as popular** The last meme that made you chuckle? Can you share a memorable moment or story from your time in the TPOT community that had a significant impact on you, without disclosing specific names or identities? **I feel that people in bbit (tpot) are really open and supportive of each other, I‚Äôve had conversations where i leave feeling motivated and wanting to build. This kind of motivational environment is hard to find.** A tweet you think is based? An image from your camera roll that you think captures your essence? [
](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb7821e3e-9424-4d8d-9719-85f130d99e7a_1440x720.jpeg )
We are eternally grateful to Jeff ji for taking out time to answer our questions. We wish him all the best for all his future endeavours. May he get to play all the good video games out there.
If you subscribe Jeff ji will give you a ride on his yak

title: Humans of TPOT: JSK Shri Hacker ji
content:
All of you who are wondering what JSK stands for, it is, Jai Shri Krishna. I am not going to explain the origin.
I started interacting with Shri Hacker ji when he gave me advice on how to build my resume, I think he asked me to remove my highschool grade from the resume. Yes, I had high school grades in my resume. Since then I have seen him on the tl a lot more. Some of y‚Äôall must have had Shri ji‚Äôs Mom‚Äôs food. Shri ji has become quite famous on X/twitter.
I have seen him conversing with trolls with utmost respect and decorum. I know he lives in USA and has a dog named Rumi, I love watching Rumi videos on my tl. Here is a photo of Rumi for more engagement:
Basic Questionnaire:
When did you join? sometime in mid 2022
How did you come across tpot?
I think i heard typeo and deba talking about it first and i was like what is this , and who‚Äôs in it and they were this is us and you are in it lmao¬†Which account do you worship here/ fav account?
i really like shauseth the bro knows how to make some slim bangers and elon¬†Hobbies? None lmao
Profession? MEMBER OF TECHNICAL STAFF YO
What is your favourite breakfast? Just black coffee *wut*
A dish you can never get enough of? THEPLA AND CHUNDO LFG!
Are you blocked by lex? Yes lmao *JSK*
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders) Man hate hate is probably Java, then CPP *he is tpot‚Äôs python ambassador*
Who is your favourite anime waifu? I actually don‚Äôt know much about this at all tbh *I kinda expected it* *After asking his favourite actress he mentioned Amy Adams* *He wasn‚Äôt aware that Amy Adams had a nose job done*
Amy Adams What is the secret to your bangers? Shoot straight from the heart , keep it short
Incel? No im married dawg¬†*Sorry, e-girls, e-boys, e-lgbtq?*
Favourite movie? (Any top 5)
_**The Prestige**_ _**Guru**_ \*I watched this movie in the theatre\* _**Luck by Chance**_ _**A river runs through it**_ _**Parasite (korean movie)**_¬†any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? _**More than 5 here:**_ [https://x.com/shrihacker/status/1629371388871184386?s=20](https://x.com/shrihacker/status/1629371388871184386?s=20) any kinda sports you follow? Only olympic swimming actually, i dont watch other sports fin.
We are grateful to Shri Hacker ji taking the time out for answering our questions. We wish him all the best for all his future endeavours. May all his xickposts get maximum engagement and he gets all the elonbux he wants.
You will subscribe if you love Lord Krishna. JSK

title: Humans of TPOT: log(Sam)
content:
I have been thinking about starting to exercise, nothing extreme like going to the gym and pumping iron, just long walks, some cycling. It should be fine. I want to avoid dying from diabetes :P
Anyway, let‚Äôs welcome today‚Äôs guest, @Sam Laki I met Sam on the BBIT gc, he reacts to every message, that is one of the most wholesome things about the lad. He acknowledges, and might laugh at silly jokes too. Given his strength, I find it a bit confusing on how is such a humble lad. I think if you ask him he will readily help you move houses.
He knows a lot of foreign people, I am not sure how. I haven‚Äôt asked him. He interacts with a lot of research posts and ‚Äústudy‚Äù posts. He doesn‚Äôt get involved in politics and e-lafdas. If I had even a quarter of his strength I would straight up become a bully :P
Questionnaire
When did you join? End of March 2022, but only started in October
How did you come across tpot? Typeoji
Which account do you worship here/ fav account? many to count, but fav is Gabriel Peyr√©
Hobbies? learning how to fight
Profession? developer of crud apps
What is your favourite breakfast? egg/ dosa
A dish you can never get enough of? daal chawal
Are you blocked by lex? nope don’t follow him
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders) Java
Who is your favourite anime waifu? Makima ofc
What is the secret to your bangers? no secrets boss, I just say what’s on my mind but try to make people relax lol
Favourite movie? (Any top 5)
* **Yojimbo** * **Battles without honour and humanity** * **Good bad and Ugly** * **Gangs of Wasseypur** * **amores perros** any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? * **Yakuza OST** * **the HU** * **Infected Mushrooms** any kinda sports you follow? **not much but Judo or wrestling** Favourite pepe? * * * We thank Sam for taking out the time for us. We wish him all the best for his future endeavours. Hope he can lift two logs at once and throw them at my enemies. May he get the Ring.
If you subscribe then Sam will help you move houses

title: Humans of TPOT: Param Likes Computers
content:
Listening to some songs make you nostalgic, some songs make you sad, some songs makes you happy, some songs make you want to pick up your keyboard smash it on table and then dance while you continue the destruction. Why do songs trigger feelings? Will songs trigger feeling when we build a conscious machine?
Anyway, let‚Äôs welcome our guest for today, Param .
I met Param ji on tpot, haven‚Äôt interacted much with him, but I feel the whole tpot knows that he is on a sabbatical. He was doing something related to sicp and QR code menus, but now it has been quite some time since I got an update. I played a game he made on his website adventures.param.codes . I think he is enjoying his sabbatical. You get to try a lot of things.
PS - I am not encouraging you to go on a sabbatical. This is not an advice and should anything go wrong you have no right to sue us.
You can understand by his twitter handle that he likes computer. Computers are complex things, humans are complex-er. Maybe some day, Computers will build humans.
Questionnaire
When did you join?
Twitter? 2011, just when i came across the wider internet.
tpot? i guess, you could say last year, although was more lurking
How did you come across tpot?
roon
Which account do you worship here/ fav account?
worship is a strong word but i like yacine, tdm, tokenbender, roon
Hobbies?
chess, thinking of project ideas but not completing them
Profession?
software engineer, currently on sabbatical
What is your favourite breakfast?
wake up too late to eat breakfast
A dish you can never get enough of?
chilli chicken
Are you blocked by lex?
nope üòé
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders)
hate java tbh, no you don‚Äôt need a factory for your builder objects of a class that inherits from an abstract class
Who is your favourite anime waifu/ fav actress/actor?
**not anime or actress or actor but superman is my favorite fictional character of all time.** What is the secret to your bangers? **just tweet moar lmao** Favourite movie? (Any top 5) **not a huge movie buff but here‚Äôs a few:** * **the social network** * **creed** * **avengers: endgame** any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? **no songs, but here‚Äôs a few albums:** * **jon hopkins - immunity** * **tame impala - lonerism** * **bon iver - for emma, forever ago** * **kanye west - my beautiful dark twisted fantasy** * **kids see ghosts - kids see ghosts** * **darkside - darkside** * **broken bells - after the disco** any kinda sports you follow? **chess and cricket (magnus, gukesh and giri are chess favorites, kohli is cricket goat)** Favourite pepe? The last meme that made you chuckle? We are grateful to Param ji for answering our questions and taking the time out for us. We wish him all the best for his future endeavours and may the force be with him. We also wish he gets to monetise his streams and donate money to us.
Everyone who subscribes will get a free computer delivered to their house, courtesy, Param ji.

title: Humans of TPOT: Prge and his Army of egirls
content:
Yesterday wasn’t such a good day, but today is better, and life seems worth living.
I’m not really sure if labelling a young lad as a ’tpot fboi’ will affect his image, but then again, all of this is for fun.
Let me introduce our guest for today, @prge !
Innit?
Just had to do that, sorry.
I’ve interacted with him on Discord voice chat and heard him hosting spaces. He’s a nice lad. I recently broke his trust by spreading disinformation about Bollywood. From what I’ve gathered talking to him, he’s a hardworking person.
His mission is to ‘colonize’ the UK.
When I interacted with him, it felt like we were already friends. On the contrary, now that I’m thinking about it, I don’t know much about him. I saw a video of him dancing, if that counts as getting to know each other.
He has traveled all over India for holidays and vacations, and he enjoys rock climbing. He’s also reading ‘Jujutsu Kaisen’, and that is all I could figure out from his profile on X.
Questionnaire
When did you join?
I think around feb 21 i got logged out of my og account and so decided to make this anon one.
Origin of your username/handle? (iff)
The kid in me always was fascinated by cool sounding names so I just made something up. Whats funny is I managed to not forget it haha
How did you come across tpot?
Not really sure tbh, but i‚Äôve followed telt and cokane since a long while, unironic too. Oh also I think vg followed me very very early on and then I think that was enough for me to start following anons haha
Which account do you worship here/ fav account?
Aah man that’s a tough one honestly. I‚Äôve found so many nice people on here and look up to most of them, for different things. Tokenbender has been a recent great buddy we hit off from the get go, so have joey and samosa haha who are relatively quite new. I like how the landscapes changed with new people yet there‚Äôs also the ones I‚Äôve known since quite a while now; feels very homely. Telt, Vg, Tarun and the occasional ranting session with TDM, although it’s been a while now lol he‚Äôs been keeping busy.
Also ofc cringe and emacs haha! Cant forget them.
Hobbies?
Idk man sports? That’s what I love and do the most right now. I used to read a lot too but its been a while.¬†Profession?
Hopefully soon employed software engineer lol
What is your favourite breakfast?
I’ve had quite a hearty breakfast lately lol. Yogurt bowl with granola and berries with a standard english breakfast, eggs bacon sausage beans and mushrooms.¬†A dish you can never get enough of?
A great lasagna is amazing. But if i am being honest i‚Äôve survived on the sainsbury chicken tikka masala with rice meal
Are you blocked by lex?
Lmao lemme check, I am ahah lfg.
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders) **class hell in java oof** Who is your favourite anime waifu/ fav actress/actor? **Oh man there‚Äôs too many but touka is great.** What is the secret to your bangers? **I don't have any bangers. My homies are just too nice to not hype me up.** Favourite movie? (Any top 5) * **About Time** * **Shwashank redemption** * **4 weddings and a funeral** * **The breakfast club** * **Whiplash**¬†**Just find me on letterboxd** any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen?¬†* **With Me - Sum 41** * **Girls Just want to have fun** * **Saviour - black veil brides** * **Summertime - mcr** * **Your love - outfield** any kinda sports you follow? **Religiously nah but whatever I am into or is going on at the time lol** Favourite pepe? **Cokaine and tdm have the best pepe game but i really like this one haha** The last meme that made you chuckle? **Imagining typec like this** Can you share a memorable moment or story from your time in the TPOT community that had a significant impact on you, without disclosing specific names or identities? **In terms of impact there might be 2 tbh. The first is how I was a lurker for the longest of time until telt messaged me out of the blue one day and idk why i started tweeting into the void, recently a guy messaged me to lmk how I had told to him to just be chill and talk to people and it had helped him a lot lol. Funny isn't it. Secondly, I think tokenbender‚Äôs been very helpful lately just helped a lot to get me back on track. Twitter might be great but its very easy to get absorbed into it.**¬†A tweet you think is based? **Everyday is a blank slate that has its bangers.**¬†An image from your camera roll that you think captures your essence? We are eternally grateful to @prge for taking out time and answering our questions. We wish him all the best for all his future endeavours and hope he succeeds in life. May the force be with him.
If you subscribe then prge will invite you to the Buckingham Palace where you will have tea with the King.

title: Humans of TPOT: Ranveer and his Accounts
content:
Did I tell you about the huge frog? Oh, yes, I did. I have been feeling a little off, maybe it is because of the sudden change in the weather, maybe viral is approaching. I cannot pin the reason, maybe I‚Äôm still fuzzy because of the anti-allergic I took yesterday night because my nose was stuffy. Anyway, let‚Äôs move on!
Today‚Äôs guest is none other than, Ranveer !
So yes Ranveer, I met Ranveer on, well, twitter. He was tweeting about freelancing and stuff, so I DM-ed him. We talked about how to set up your accounts on fiverr/upwork, get freelance work, make your profile awesome and earn moolah.
Ranveer is a CPA, that much is written on his profile, duh. Lively fellow, interested in women, I think he is inclined towards Lahori Kudis. How do I know this? He has said this several times on a GC.
Texts in ** is my inner monologue.
Basic Questionnaire:
When did you join? Feb 2021¬†How did you come across tpot? I discovered Naval through JRE,then Balaji, and then Varunram Ganesh jee…he’s the one who introduced me to tpot¬†*vrg I see*
Origin of your username?
Ranveer allahabadia was talking about how having the name “ranveer” made him more attractive to girls…I tried out that hypothesis while flirting with people on Omegle (I had plenty of free time during corona) and it did work regardless of the culture they were from..since then I started telling people my name was ranveer, to the point I got comfortable with it..hence this username
Which account do you worship here/ fav account? I worship no one other than Hanuman jee ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è..
Jai Hanuman! Hobbies? Reading random books on psychology, scrolling twitter, listening to podcasts
Profession? I’m a Chartered Accountant
What is your favourite breakfast? They sell these sandwiches at Calcutta stock exchange with very yummy tea, I loveeeee that
A dish you can never get enough of? Samosa and golgappe…I can eat unlimited amount of samosa and golgappe (have even won one golgappe eating competition)
Are you blocked by lex? Yes, also I’m in a gc where all the people blocked by lex used to bitch about him…it’s fun *Sounds kinda fun*
Who is your favourite anime waifu? I wanna say shizuka but she’s a hoe…so I’ll choose Nobita kii mummy (wish she was single) *I made a meme just for ranveer*
What is the secret to your bangers? life stories tbh, idk why people love them…also I download my favourite insta reels once a while and they get good reach too
Incel? Yes, I’m an incel… lfgggg üî•üî•üî•üî• *I don‚Äôt think he knows what an incel is :P*
Favourite movie? (Any top 5) “before sunrise”, “an officer and a gentleman”
any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? 5 songs I can’t suggest, here’s my favourite few though: stereo hearts ft Adam Levine,
**Heart on my sleeve by olly murs, toothbrush by dnce** _\*I also like DNCE\*_ any kinda sports you follow? only sport I’m obsessed with is moneymaking, nothing else gets my interest going *chad*
The last meme that made you chuckle?
Can you share a memorable moment or story from your time in the TPOT community that had a significant impact on you, without disclosing specific names or identities? **Helping prge flirt with e girls was kinda wholesome** We present our immense gratitude towards Ranveer ji for taking the time out and answering our questions. We wish him All the Best in all his future endeavours and maybe the force be with him. Hope all his clients have the right balance.
If you subscribe then Ranveer ji will do your taxes for free.

title: Humans of TPOT: Samosa and his perils
content:
Before I get to the guest for today, let me tell you about something I saw today, I saw a big frog today, like really big. Can you believe it? Okay, stop I can sense that y‚Äôall don‚Äôt care, anyway lets move on!
Our guest for today is a snacc, presenting basked_samosa !
I met Samosa ji on, yes, twitter. He co-writes a newsletter: nibbles.dev . It is the only newsletter than I read on a regular basis. Samosa ji is also interested in origin of words. My latest surprise was the origin of the word `kukurmutta` (‡§ï‡•Å‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞‡§Æ‡•Å‡§§‡•ç‡§§‡§æ) - mushroom. I won‚Äôt tell you what it is you can find it out on your own.
There are similarities between Samosa ji and me, we both like to write. I feel he is a better writer and I‚Äôd learn from him.
He is a wholesome human and I am glad that I got introduced to him. We both are cokanestudio stans. I am not sure if Samosa ji can cook a Samosa IRL, but I hope that he can.
My thoughts are encapsulated in **.
Basic Questionnaire:
When did you join?
2018 but started being active from Q2 2023.
How did you come across tpot?
i used to follow @dejavucoder on twitter and substack. if you don‚Äôt know him (shame on you if you don‚Äôt), he‚Äôs the apple of tpot‚Äôs eyes and through him, i got to know other fellow tpotians.
Which account do you worship here/ fav account?
oh it‚Äôs you mr. vivek , who else? i also like random accounts that post pretty cloud pics. *this is just flattery, you were appreciating dejavucoder above*
Hobbies?
reading books, sketching, playing badminton, cycling, finding stories behind word origins.
Profession? full slap stack developer.
What is your favourite breakfast? boiled/raw sprouts.
A dish you can never get enough of? laccha paratha and matar paneer with thandi thandi rice kheer (prepared by my mataji).
Are you blocked by lex? no. i love lex and all the humans on this planet. why would he block me?
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders)
baji (jk, just wanted to appreciate joey‚Äôs work here). i don‚Äôt know enough yet to form an opinion to hate a language (it‚Äôs css).
Who is your favourite anime waifu?
**faye valentine from kauboi bibappu.** _\*ahh bebop\*_ What is the secret to your bangers? **‡§™‡•ã‡§•‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ‡§ó ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ø, ‡§¢‡§æ‡§à ‡§Ü‡§ñ‡§∞ ‚Äòjust be yourself‚Äô ‡§ï‡§æ, ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡•á ‡§∏‡•ã ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ó‡§∞ ‡§π‡•ã‡§Ø‡•§** Incel? wish i wasn‚Äôt üôÅ *codermatrimony.com*
Favourite movie? (Any top 5)
**[Coco](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2380307/) (colourful)** **[Grave of the Fireflies](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0095327/) (sad)** **[Forrest Gump](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109830/) (cheerful)** **[Gangs of Wasseypur 1&2](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1954470/) (fun)** **[500 Days of Summer](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1022603/) (only watch post-heartbreak)** any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? **[Kiska Rasta Dekhe](https://youtu.be/5f5VC1UVuGA?si=cjOwv2MYaePIjWUy) - Kishore Kumar** **[Haal Kaisa Hai Janab Ka](https://youtu.be/MJ6e4VWgaM8?si=hZ7bjvqNa73CSne5) - Asha Bhosle and Kishore Kumar** **[Abhi Na Jao Chhod Kar](https://youtu.be/mfEQgoVi7P4?si=vRRfhXzpWIKrn67_) - Asha Bhosle and Md. Rafi** **[Aaja Piya Tohe Pyar Doon](https://youtu.be/T1FcSe-J2HQ?si=uznvlNlqYtjkc9FY) - Lata Mangeshkar** **[Ehsan Tera Hoga Mujhpar](https://youtu.be/DnIUta3hyLE?si=SS_xRQ_57MlCO61h) - Md. Rafi** any kinda sports you follow? none
Favourite pepe?
The last meme that made you chuckle? An image from your camera roll that you think captures your essence? I love this one! A few weeks back I was out cycling in the evening and all of a sudden Lord Indra started a heavy downpour. I waited inside a nearby shop for some time but the rains didn't seem to be stopping anytime soon. So I said, "Screw it, I'll just cycle in the rain." and loved it so much Can you share a memorable moment or story from your time in the TPOT community that had a significant impact on you, without disclosing specific names or identities? **It‚Äôs always interesting to get to know the real person behind the PFP. There‚Äôs only so much you can say in 280 characters (not counting the blue tick accounts here hehe). That, combined with the constant urge to put out something - something funny, something banger, something tongue-in-cheek - reveals only a part of a person to you. So it is always a delight when I get to know people beyond my usual twitter timeline. Everything from joining WhatsApp groups and discussing unhinged stuff there, going on Discord Channels and doing VCs for hours talking about what‚Äôs going on in each other‚Äôs lives, actually going forward to meet them in real life, do fun things and explore new places around together, these all are very memorable for me. I have found some really good folks here.** fin.
We thank basked_samosa for answering our questions, we wish him All the Best in his future endeavours, we‚Äôd like to see him opening his own Samosa chain some day in the future. May the force be with him.
Thanks for reading, for a free samosa, please subscribe.

title: Humans of TPOT: The Almighty Telt
content:
I think a polarised world will work in the benefit of human society because people will see how ridiculous the extreme opinions are and then people will start floating over the centre. I am just putting out this idea, I don‚Äôt know if it makes sense.
Anyway, today I bring Telt senpai to all y‚Äôall. He is the co-founder for BBIT and a human being with a mesmerising chad voice.
I interacted with Telt senpai in a GC and on a discord channel. Everyone at BBIT is a telt senpai voice stan.
Honestly, I don‚Äôt know much about telt senpai. I have realised this while writing. I don‚Äôt know the reason for it. He seems to be friends with a lot of people on tpot. I have seen his tweet replies across all accounts on tpot. But the thing is I don‚Äôt have much to say.
Oh yes, he ran/runs a BBIT grant, the grant was to provide monetary assistance to projects. I also remember that he and a few BBIT folks sponsored a prize at some hackathon. He is an indie Philanthropist? I don‚Äôt know how to label this. He he he.
Questionnaire:
When did you join? 2009
How did you come across tpot? I think it must have been a viral tweet and then I just looked at their follows. Might have been @allgarbled or @growing_daniel Which account do you worship here/ fav account? Fav accs cause I found them first and loved the vibes: @DebadreeC, @cto_junior, @beeryaniboi and @dejavucoder. But there‚Äôs just way too many amazing anons that I‚Äôve met irl or in various GCs.
Hobbies? books, placating my insecurities
Profession? software enjoyoor
What is your favourite breakfast? late lunch because intermittent fasting (this is how I lost a lot of weight the first time)
A dish you can never get enough of? bhel¬†Are you blocked by lex? nah I don‚Äôt follow him
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders) I don‚Äôt hate on anything, why hold onto a hot coal especially those that don‚Äôt have side effects.
Who is your favourite anime waifu/ fav actress/actor? Toss up between Mitsuha and Motoko Kusanagi (and maybe Dors Venabili)
Mitsuha Motoko Kusanagi What is the secret to your bangers? I feel like I got mostly lucky. It‚Äôs a combination of figuring out the current thing and making a joke about it but my bangers are not even close to being Bangers. It takes a bit of work to figure out what people talk about and play to the algorithm. Paraphrasing growing_daniel, ‚Äúremember when I used to put in effort to write bangers‚Äù.
Favourite movie? The Great Escape
any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen to?
**Red Barchetta,** **Evergreen Cassette by Goldspot** **Ants Marching** **Chaudhary by Mame Khan** **Archie Marry Me** **Walking on The Moon.** any kinda sports you follow? Mostly Cricket and finals for most events.
Favourite pepe? Smug pepe because it‚Äôs perfect¬†what single advice would you give to your younger self when he/she is about to join twitter? and what’s the one thing you’d want them to absolutely not do here? **vibes are just one signal, (don't be an ass) be nice.** Can you share a memorable moment or story from your time in the TPOT community that had a significant impact on you? I met an anon and realised there’s a way to jump the online-offline gap and, the vibes follow.
Can you share an image that captures your essence as a human?
fin.
We are eternally grateful to Telt senpai for taking out the time and answering our questions. We wish him all the best for all his future endeavours, may he become a Pokemon trainer, get a Raichu and win the Pokemon Battle Tournament.
Telt Senpai will send a personalised voice recording to everyone who subscribes.

title: Humans of TPOT: The Art of Tokenbending
content:
Today we are going to talk about a human who plays with LLMs (Large Language Models), TokenBender (e/xperiments) .
Yes, we are going to talk `about him` and not `to him`.
Yes, I have confirmed his pronoun preference.
So bender ji is my senpai, no not in that kind of way you morons! He is someone whom I have conversed with on discord. We talked about LLMs and everything around it.
Bender senpai created his account in college but wasn‚Äôt active until the start of this year. He found many like minded people here and then ended up interacting with schizos. I have never seen him interact with political posts or bait posts, I also believe it is the reason that he has maintained his sanity. he-he-he
So text inside *my inner monologue* is my inner monologue.
Basic Questionnaire
Which account do you worship here? I don’t worship anyone specifically but I admire folks like Karpathy/Gerganov. At the same time, I don’t trust everything they say as well
Hobbies? reading novels, swimming, strategy games of any kind - you can find him in his society‚Äôs swimming pool whenever he feels - *okay he said twice a week*
Profession? SW engineer (tech lead)
What is your favourite breakfast? Scrambled eggs/poha/chai paratha
Are you blocked by lex? I never interacted with anything related to Lex ever I guess, except few podcasts - No
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders) Alright I don’t like what is the current state of web dev largely to the credit of framework driven development - he relents - * I think we all know where is pointing to*
Who is your favourite anime waifu? * I wasn‚Äôt really surprised*
What is the secret to your bangers? hard hitting relatable truths make the best bangers imo
Incel? I’m a local LLM-cel I guess.
Favourite movie? (top 5) Fight club, twelve angry men, Batman: The Dark Knight, Rango, Kimi no na wa
any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? Till I Collapse - Eminem, Feeling Good - Michael Buble, Ghosts - Michael Jackson, Luk Chup Na Jao Ji, Dandalayya - Baahubali
any kinda sports you follow? I like to follow chess and some top fighters in UFC and whenever there’s a good cricket match-up
Favourite pepe?
The last meme that made you chuckle? * I chose this for him* Summary as told by ChatGPT (I asked chatgpt to judge him but chatgpt refused)
This person admires Karpathy and Gerganov but remains skeptical. They’re a tech lead software engineer who enjoys reading, swimming, and strategy games. Their favorite breakfast is scrambled eggs or poha. They follow chess, UFC fighters, like movies such as “Fight Club,” and enjoy songs from Eminem and Michael Buble. No judgments are made about them.
fin.
A huge thanks to TokenBender (e/xperiments) for taking the time out to answer my questions. He volunteered to give this a chance. HOTPOT wishes him all the best for all his future endeavours and may his LLM models beat all other LLM models.
To the moon! üöÄüöÄ

title: Humans of TPOT: The Rise of Cocainestudio
content:
This story is not about me but I‚Äôll tell this story as a first person so y‚Äôall can suck it!
I met @cokanestudio on twitter/X when some of my moots started interacting with his posts. Seemed like a friendly fella, he is actually friendly and not hostile as you‚Äôd assume controlled substance dealers are. (j/k, he is a code-coolie, like me)
He influenced me into buying IEMs, and not only me a lot of people were influenced and most of the TPOT now owns IEMs. I don‚Äôt know if he benefitted from that or not. Could‚Äôve.
Anyway, as mentioned before he is a code-coolie. Nice fella. Same Indian Engineering Story as everyone.
He says that he joined to learn tech-y things and followed tech accounts, got fed up with their DSA course posts and created an alt to troll them but ended up making frens. He is a fellow BBIT member and clicks nice photos, I have heard from some of my sources that he runs a photography CBC secretly only for his frens.
I asked cokane a few questions and he was glad to answer them for us (HOTPOT)
Basic questionnaire answers:
When did you join? 2021
How did you come across tpot? ligmesh and prge Which account do you worship here? vivek Hobbies? spectate e-lafda
Profession? wagie in a cagie writing webapps
What is your favourite breakfast? intermittent fasting bruv, no breakfast for me
Are you blocked by lex? no :(
Which programming language do you hate? html
Who is your favourite anime waifu? dejavucoder What is the secret to your bangers? boost
Incel? 100%
Favourite movie? (Any top 5) social network, fight club, american psycho, drive, batman 2022 (mainstreamdepressed incel is my fav genre)
any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? whatever songs spotify gives when u enter seedhe maut
favourite sports? whatever the girl I am talking to is into
favourite pepe?
The last meme that made you chuckle? Summary as per ChatGPT:
This person appears to have a humorous and somewhat irreverent personality, with interests ranging from niche internet culture to mainstream movies. They also exhibit a sense of adaptability in their social interactions, as their favorite sports depend on the preferences of those they engage with.
fin.
I wish @cokanestudio the best for his future endeavours. May the force be with you. Keep posting bangers!
Shoutout to @cokanestudio for taking the time out for answering questions and being a part for the newly formed Humans of TPOT publication. We aren‚Äôt popular still cokane ji took out time for us.
The questionnaire will keep improving as we go, I promise! For any feedback, my DMs are open.
To the moon and beyond! üöÄüöÄcokane
Thanks for reading Humans of TPOT publication. Please subscribe for more TPOT related news and humour. I am funny, I promise! :‚Äô)

title: Humans of TPOT: Unraveling EDS
content:
I have been on twitter/X for a while now, I know this story isn‚Äôt about me, but I am the one writing it, innit? So you gotta bare with me. Also follow Humans of TPOT.
Yes, so what was I saying? Yes. It has been a while on twitter/X, I went through the trauma of twitter ‚Üí X transition. Whilst it was painful, something of this sort was bound to happen. We weathered the storm. Enough of my ramblings then, let‚Äôs get to the main story now.
Today‚Äôs guest is none other than the shining star of tpot, @emacsdicksucker . He has many personalities but I asked him to be an optimist for this conversation. There are many schizos on twitter but EDS is my favourite, you can some times find him on spaces, enthusiastic fellow with heart full of love for all species.
I have attended spaces where EDS was present, although could never figure out how he was so energetic at night. I won‚Äôt ask him to reveal his secret. I hope he enjoyed his 7 cigarettes. (inside joke)
All text in ** is my inner monologue.
Basic Questionnaire
When did you join? Around March, methinks
How did you come across tpot? A friend of mine invited me
Which account do you worship here/ fav account? Dune Bot, TokenBender, Tree, TDM.
I like people who build because they can, so many others. *he loves Dune quotes even the most basic ones*
Hobbies? Keyboards, Reading, Fucking around. Biking.
Profession? I solve problems. *I create problems, thanks for coming to my ted talk*
What is your favourite breakfast? Bagel and Cream cheese. Croissant and Black coffee.
A dish you can never get enough of? Mashed Potato. Yoghurt.
Are you blocked by lex? fuck’s a lex ? *I kinda expected this*
Which programming language do you hate? (only for coders)
Java, I’d say. Too verbose, and to add to that my eyes fuckin burn from the camel case.
Who is your favourite anime waifu/husbando?
Shiroe [ ](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F636ca880-10a0-45c2-9057-a7c671aad661_300x168.jpeg )
Mikumo Rem _**Rem, Re:zero. Husbando would be World Trigger's Mikumo or Log Horizon's Shiroe. I like smart compassionate peeps.**_ What is the secret to your bangers? _**I never did understand what a banger is.**_ Incel? _**Let's just say I've been a good boy on many an occasion.**_ _**And a really bad boy on many others.**_ Favourite movie? (Any top 5) _**Interstate 60. the man from earth. blue is the warmest color. The thing. Total Recall (Arnold)**_ any 5 go-to songs that you think people should listen? _**Kara Square - Heart stopping Lies,**_ _**Wayside - Ghost (whole playlist)**_ _**Kraftwerk - The Man Machine**_¬†_**mxtoon - i feel like chet**_¬†_**Lenka (all songs)**_ _**also‚Ä¶‚Ä¶West Coast over East coast**_ any kinda sports you follow? _**Dota 2.**_ \*woot, woot!\* Favourite pepe? _**Me**_ The last meme that made you chuckle? _**Greentexts and xkcd always make me chuckle. Also gone with the blastwave shoutout!**_ ChatGPT Summary
Joined around March via a friend’s invite, admires accounts like Dune Bot, enjoys hobbies like keyboards and biking. Professionally a problem solver, dislikes Java in coding, and has varied romantic experiences.
fin.
A heartfelt thanks to @emacsdicksucker for taking out the time and answering our questions. I also thank all his personalities for being patient. We wish EDS ji all the best for his future endeavours. May he become the ruler of Earth.
If you liked this then you will like the next blogs also, so subscribe, and follow us on Twitter/X.
